scripts.now-build: echo not cd node_modules/vbb-stations/ && echo not npm i && echo not npm run build && echo not cd ../.. && cd node_modules && npx babel-cli --presets es2015 vbb-tokenize-station --out-dir vbb-tokenize-station && cd vbb-stations && npx babel-cli --presets es2015 index.js --out-file index.js && npx babel-cli --presets es2015 simple.js --out-file simple.js && cd .. && npx babel-cli --presets es2015 vbb-client --out-dir vbb-client && npx babel-cli --presets es2015 hifo --out-dir hifo && cd .. && npm run build
scripts.surge: react-scripts build && cd build && surge -d busses.surge.sh
